backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features related to displaying Claude API analysis results with rating circles, explanations, Bible verses, and a "Try Another" button, all mapped to HomePage.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the app structure: React app with TanStack Router, Claude API integration for Biblical content analysis, inline results display with color-coded ratings, and API key management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for a faith-inspired design palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Biblical Lens application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with single home route, wrapped in QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and AnalysisProvider contexts.
frontend/src/components/ApiKeyInput.tsx: Component for entering, saving, editing, and clearing Anthropic API keys with localStorage persistence, validation, show/hide toggle, and links to obtain keys.
frontend/src/components/BibleVerse.tsx: Component displaying Bible verse text in blockquote format with reference and NIV attribution, styled with quote icon.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header showing Biblical Lens branding, main content outlet, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/RatingCircle.tsx: Component rendering large colored circle with icon (green/yellow/red) indicating Biblical alignment rating with corresponding label and glow effect.
frontend/src/contexts/AnalysisContext.ts: React context provider managing analysis results and video description state, enabling data sharing across components with setAnalysis and clearAnalysis methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook creating and managing backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApiKey.ts: Custom hook managing Anthropic API key state with localStorage persistence, providing get, set, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the app uses direct API calls instead of backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, faith-inspired color palette including primary colors, rating colors (green/yellow/red), and dark mode variants using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main page component that handles video description input, triggers Claude API analysis, and displays results (rating circle, explanation, Bible verse) with a 'Try Another' reset button.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Empty file, indicating results are displayed inline on HomePage rather than on a separate page.
frontend/src/services/claudeApi.ts: Service layer that calls the Anthropic Claude API to analyze video descriptions and return structured JSON with rating, explanation, verse reference, and verse text.
frontend/src/types/analysis.ts: TypeScript interface defining the AnalysisResult structure with rating, explanation, verseReference, and verseText fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors using OKLCH values, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the Biblical Lens app's architecture, features, and requirements including inline results display, AI-provided Bible verses, and the 'Try Another' reset functionality.
